title: No XP from last match
body: I didnt get XP for my last game. When we destroyed the enemy nexus it gave me an error and i had to Exit League of Legends. After logging in i didnt get any XP from last match. Someone else?

replies.body: Strange. It does look like the latest match you won didn't give any XP. Hit up our game peeps in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can get this straightened out for ya!
